hero.title: Customs clearance
hero.desc: We carry out customs clearance procedures easily and clearly, with continuous follow-up to ensure that your goods exit on time

customsClearanceDesc.title: Fast customs clearance without complications
customsClearanceDesc.desc: Our customs clearance service streamlines all necessary procedures and documentation for your goods to pass through customs without delays. We manage paperwork and coordinate with authorities for smooth delivery.

customsClearanceFeatures.title: Discover why Femex is your top choice for customs clearance services

desc.descOne: Track procedures from start to finish until your goods are released
desc.descTwo: Ensure that all required documents are ready before applying
desc.descThree: Reducing the time spent on review and examination
desc.descFour: A specialized team follows up the customs file step by step

howItWorks.title: How does the customs clearance service work?
howItWorks.desc: Clear steps to facilitate the customs clearance process without complexity

cardOne.heading: Receive shipment details
cardOne.desc: Review basic information and verify requirements

cardTwo.heading: Handle document preparation
cardTwo.desc: Collect the necessary papers and coordinate them with the competent authorities

cardThree.heading: Check on customs procedures
cardThree.desc: Submit applications, examine, and review until approval

cardFour.heading: Completing the delivery of your goods.
cardFour.desc: Finishing the procedures and delivering the shipment to the customer or the storage location

questionOne.question: What documents are required for customs clearance?
questionOne.answer: It varies according to the type of shipment, and what is required is clarified when starting the order

questionTwo.question: How long does the clearance process take?
questionTwo.answer: The duration varies depending on the type of goods and procedures, and every step is followed up with you

questionThree.question: Are there additional fees during clearance?
questionThree.answer: Any potential costs are explained upfront to ensure transparency

questionFour.question: Can you handle all types of shipments?
questionFour.answer: Yes, the service is provided according to the procedures available for each shipment type

questionFive.question: How much does customs clearance service cost?
questionFive.answer: The cost varies according to the port and the type of goods, and the price can be obtained upon communication

readyCustomsClearance.title: Ready to start with us?
readyCustomsClearance.desc: Request customs clearance service now and enjoy a smooth and clear process from start to finish
